rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Yourgene Health 和 Genetix 在哥伦比亚推出首个本地无创产前检测服务Yourgene Health（隶属于 Novacyt 公司集团）是一家领先的国际分子诊断集团，已在哥伦比亚的 Genetix（一家专门从事人类基因诊断的高科技医疗机构）安装了第一个无创产前检测 (NIPT) 工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Yourgene-Health-and-Genetix-launch-first-local-non-pressive-prenatal-testing-service-in-Colombia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Yourgene-Health-and-Genetix-launch-first-local-non-pressive-prenatal-testing-service-in-Colombia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=193f40c3-bdcb-4be5-8ff1-496abdba6eda Mon, 07 Oct 2024 02:45:00 -0400
Ingenza 宣布转向专用设施以扩大发酵和研究能力Ingenza – 世界领先的合同研究、开发和制造组织 (CRDMO) 和技术加速器 – 很高兴地宣布计划搬迁至 Pioneer Group 旗下爱丁堡 Technopole 的 Moubray 大楼。经过详细的战略审查后，该公司已着手建立一个耗资数百万英镑的设施，以帮助推动其雄心勃勃的增长计划。该专门建造的场地将使 Ingenza 目前的占地面积增加一倍以上，达到约 25,000 平方英尺，扩大其发酵和研究设施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Ingenza-announces-move-to- Purpose-built-facilities-to-expand-fermentation-and-research-capacity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Ingenza-announces-move-to- Purpose-built-facilities-to-expand-fermentation-and-research-capacity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdd949e8-8e7c-4ba8-bf2c-d5a61d93f390 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 02:41:00 -0400 Ingenza announces move to purpose-built facilities to expand fermentation and research capacity
COVID-19 会增加慢性疲劳风险研究表明，COVID-19 会显着增加慢性疲劳综合症的风险，其中老年人、亚洲人和非住院患者等特定人群的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/COVID-19-increases-chronic-fatigue-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/COVID-19-increases-chronic-fatigue-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d6dd64b-ad21-4276-bb80-256f8941acab Mon, 07 Oct 2024 00:19:00 -0400 COVID-19 increases chronic fatigue risk
研究人员将空气污染与脑萎缩联系起来，但发现对认知功能没有影响暴露于中高范围的 PM2.5 与脑萎缩有关，但对认知功能没有显着影响。研究结果表明，城市化在调节空气污染对大脑结构的影响方面发挥着一定作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Researchers-link-air-pollution-to-cerebral-atropy-but-find-no-impact-on-cognitive-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Researchers-link-air-pollution-to-cerebral-atropy-but-find-no-impact-on-cognitive-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76ff9e0b-8fd3-45bd-86ab-bc3a6923abb6 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 23:43:00 -0400 Researchers link air pollution to cerebral atrophy but find no impact on cognitive function
巴氏灭菌可有效减少牛奶中的 H5N1 病毒，但进一步测试仍是必要的研究探索了巴氏灭菌条件下牛奶中 H5N1 流感病毒的恢复能力，显示在标准温度下可有效灭活病毒，但强调需要进一步进行实际测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Pasteurization- effectively-reduces-H5N1-virus-in-milk-but-further-testing-is-essential.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Pasteurization- effectively-reduces-H5N1-virus-in-milk-but-further-testing-is-essential.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9da82eb-5461-4429-9000-3eaea0cf0339 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 23:06:00 -0400 Pasteurization effectively reduces H5N1 virus in milk but further testing is essential
肉碱转运蛋白如何促进生殖健康研究揭示了肉碱转运蛋白通过调节能量代谢和保护生殖细胞免受氧化应激来维持生育能力的关键作用。它提出了通过补充肉碱和靶向治疗治疗不孕症的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/How-carnitine-transporters-boost-reproductive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/How-carnitine-transporters-boost-reproductive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=255f5e17-bb14-4956-ad95-4f8177b05a24 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 22:44:00 -0400 How carnitine transporters boost reproductive health
新研究显示，友谊可以提高单身新兴成年人的幸福感研究人员利用潜在特征分析，确定了 18-24 岁单身新兴成年人的五种不同的幸福特征，其中友谊满意度成为一个关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Friendship-drives-happiness-in-single-emerging-adults-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Friendship-drives-happiness-in-single-emerging-adults-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1017616-daaf-4ceb-ab1e-b6c59a271550 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 22:01:00 -0400 Friendship drives happiness in single emerging adults, new study reveals
精神分裂症相关幻觉与运动感觉信号中断有关研究人员发现，精神分裂症患者的伴随放电（CD）和噪音传出拷贝（EC）受损会扰乱自我监控，导致幻听。计算模型揭示了这些运动到感觉功能障碍如何导致幻觉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Schizophrenia-lated-hallucinations-linked-to-disrupted-motor-sensory-signals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Schizophrenia-lated-hallucinations-linked-to-disrupted-motor-sensory-signals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8084c2e3-caf2-4b25-98f7-02cd6843aa49 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 21:42:00 -0400 Schizophrenia-related hallucinations linked to disrupted motor-sensory signals
科技突破有效减少了课堂上手机的使用技术中断减少了大学课堂上手机的使用，但对学习成绩的影响好坏参半，表明需要进一步调查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Tech-breaks-efficiently-reduce-cell-phone-use-in-classrooms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Tech-breaks-efficiently-reduce-cell-phone-use-in-classrooms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df454067-9299-4f55-9927-17abedb9dc12 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 21:30:00 -0400 Tech breaks effectively reduce cell phone use in classrooms
研究表明流感疫苗对儿童非常有效，但也强调了某些亚型的挑战研究发现，流感疫苗接种对于预防儿童感染和住院治疗非常有效，但由于样本量较小，针对 H3N2 等某些亚型的疗效仍然有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Study-reveals-high-efficiency-of-flu-vaccines-in-children-but-highlights-challenges-with-certain-subtypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Study-reveals-high-efficiency-of-flu-vaccines-in-children-but-highlights-challenges-with-certain-subtypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da8150b9-05f0-4beb-9859-eea74226a23b Sun, 06 Oct 2024 20:30:00 -0400 Study reveals high effectiveness of flu vaccines in children but highlights challenges with certain subtypes
